import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Hero.css'; import MathGame from './MathGame'; const Hero = () => { const [showMathGame, setShowMathGame] = useState(false); const [currentEquationIndex, setCurrentEquationIndex] = useState(0); const equations = [ // Numerical Analysis & Linear Algebra { formula: "xÃÇ = F_N x, (F_N)_{k‚Ñì} = e^(-2œÄik‚Ñì/N)", description: "Discrete Fourier Transform" }, { formula: "H_n = H_1^‚äón, H_1 = [[1,1],[1,-1]]", description: "Hadamard Transform" }, { formula: "v_{k+1} = Av_k/||Av_k||", description: "Power Iteration Method" }, { formula: "A = QR, Q^T Q = I, R upper-triangular", description: "QR Decomposition" }, { formula: "A = UŒ£V^T, Œ£ = diag(œÉ‚ÇÅ,...)", description: "Singular Value Decomposition" }, { formula: "x_{k+1} = x_k + Œ±_k p_k, Œ±_k = r_k^T r_k/(p_k^T A p_k)", description: "Conjugate Gradient Method" }, { formula: "Œ≤ÃÇ = (X^T X + ŒªI)^(-1) X^T y", description: "Ridge Regression" }, { formula: "(A+UCV)^(-1) = A^(-1) - A^(-1)U(C^(-1)+VA^(-1)U)^(-1)VA^(-1)", description: "Sherman-Morrison-Woodbury" }, { formula: "ŒîŒª·µ¢ ‚âà u·µ¢^T(ŒîA)u·µ¢", description: "Eigenvalue Perturbation" }, // Optimisation & Machine Learning { formula: "Œ∏‚Çú‚Çä‚ÇÅ = Œ∏‚Çú - Œ∑‚àáŒ∏‚Ñí(Œ∏‚Çú)", description: "Gradient Descent" }, { formula: "m‚Çú = Œ≤‚ÇÅm_{t-1} + (1-Œ≤‚ÇÅ)g‚Çú, v‚Çú = Œ≤‚ÇÇv_{t-1} + (1-Œ≤‚ÇÇ)g‚Çú¬≤", description: "Adam Optimizer" }, { formula: "‚àÇ‚Ñí/‚àÇx·µ¢ = Œ£‚±º(‚àÇ‚Ñí/‚àÇy‚±º)(‚àÇy‚±º/‚àÇx·µ¢)", description: "Backpropagation Chain Rule" }, { formula: "‚Ñí = -Œ£‚Çñ y‚Çñ log(softmax_k(z))", description: "Cross-Entropy Loss" }, { formula: "‚Ñí = Œ£·µ¢ max(0, 1 - y·µ¢(w^T x·µ¢ + b))", description: "Hinge Loss (SVM)" }, { formula: "‚àáŒ∏‚Ñí + Œ£‚±º Œª‚±º‚àáŒ∏g‚±º = 0, Œª‚±ºg‚±º = 0", description: "KKT Conditions" }, { formula: "min_Œ≤ ¬Ω||y - XŒ≤||¬≤ + Œª||Œ≤||‚ÇÅ", description: "LASSO Regression" }, { formula: "Œª(Œ±||Œ≤||‚ÇÅ + (1-Œ±)||Œ≤||‚ÇÇ¬≤/2)", description: "Elastic Net Penalty" }, { formula: "Q(Œ∏|Œ∏^(t)) = E_{Z|X,Œ∏^(t)}[log p(X,Z|Œ∏)]", description: "EM Algorithm E-step" }, { formula: "Attn(Q,K,V) = softmax(QK^T/‚àöd)V", description: "Transformer Attention" }, { formula: "y = ‚Ñ±(x) + x", description: "Residual Connection" }, { formula: "xÃÇ = (x-Œº_B)/‚àö(œÉ_B¬≤+Œµ), y = Œ≥xÃÇ + Œ≤", description: "Batch Normalization" }, { formula: "E[hÃÉ] = p¬∑h, p = Pr(unit kept)", description: "Dropout Regularization" }, // Information Theory & Statistics { formula: "H(X) = -Œ£‚Çì p(x) log p(x)", description: "Shannon Entropy" }, { formula: "D_{KL}(P||Q) = Œ£‚Çì p(x) log(p(x)/q(x))", description: "Kullback-Leibler Divergence" }, { formula: "I(X;Y) = Œ£‚Çì,·µß p(x,y) log(p(x,y)/(p(x)p(y)))", description: "Mutual Information" }, { formula: "H(P,Q) = H(P) + D_{KL}(P||Q)", description: "Cross Entropy" }, { formula: "(‚Ñê(Œ∏))·µ¢‚±º = -E[‚àÇ¬≤/‚àÇŒ∏·µ¢‚àÇŒ∏‚±º log p(X;Œ∏)]", description: "Fisher Information Matrix" }, { formula: "Var(Œ∏ÃÇ) ‚â• ‚Ñê(Œ∏)^(-1)", description: "Cram√©r-Rao Lower Bound" }, { formula: "E[X] = E_Y[E[X|Y]]", description: "Law of Total Expectation" }, { formula: "(Œ£·µ¢ X·µ¢ - nŒº)/(œÉ‚àön) ‚Üí^d N(0,1)", description: "Central Limit Theorem" }, { formula: "Œ≤ÃÇ = (X^T X)^(-1) X^T y minimizes Var(Œ≤ÃÇ)", description: "Gauss-Markov Theorem" }, // Stochastic Processes & Control { formula: "df = (‚àÇf/‚àÇt)dt + (‚àÇf/‚àÇS)dS + ¬Ω(‚àÇ¬≤f/‚àÇS¬≤)œÉ¬≤S¬≤dt", description: "It√¥'s Lemma" }, { formula: "dS‚Çú = ŒºS‚Çúdt + œÉS‚ÇúdW‚Çú", description: "Geometric Brownian Motion" }, { formula: "‚àÇp/‚àÇt = -‚àÇ/‚àÇx(a(x)p) + ¬Ω‚àÇ¬≤/‚àÇx¬≤(b(x)p)", description: "Fokker-Planck Equation" }, { formula: "xÃÇ_{k|k-1} = AxÃÇ_{k-1|k-1} + Bu_{k-1}", description: "Kalman Filter Prediction" }, { formula: "Œ±‚Çú‚Çä‚ÇÅ(j) = [Œ£·µ¢ Œ±‚Çú(i)a·µ¢‚±º]b‚±º(o‚Çú‚Çä‚ÇÅ)", description: "Hidden Markov Model Forward" }, { formula: "0 = inf_u{L(x,u) + ‚àáV¬∑f(x,u)}", description: "Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman" }, { formula: "V^œÄ(s) = E_œÄ[r‚Çú‚Çä‚ÇÅ + Œ≥V^œÄ(s‚Çú‚Çä‚ÇÅ)|s‚Çú=s]", description: "Bellman Equation" }, { formula: "Q‚Çú‚Çä‚ÇÅ(s,a) = Q‚Çú(s,a) + Œ±[r + Œ≥max_{a'}Q‚Çú(s',a') - Q‚Çú(s,a)]", description: "Q-Learning Update" }, { formula: "f(t) = Œªe^(-Œªt)", description: "Exponential Distribution" }, { formula: "dX‚Çú = Œ∫(Œ∏-X‚Çú)dt + œÉdW‚Çú", description: "Ornstein-Uhlenbeck Process" }, // Algorithms & Complexity { formula: "T(n) = aT(n/b) + Œò(n·∂ú) ‚áí T(n) = Œò(n·∂ú log n)", description: "Master Theorem" }, { formula: "œÄ^T = œÄ^T(Œ±P + (1-Œ±)1v^T)", description: "PageRank Algorithm" }, { formula: "||P^t(x,¬∑) - œÄ||_{TV} ‚â§ (1-Œª‚ÇÇ)^t", description: "Markov Chain Mixing" }, { formula: "p ‚âà (1-e^(-kn/m))^k", description: "Bloom Filter False Positive" }, { formula: "E[collisions] = n¬≤/2m", description: "Hash Table Collisions" }, { formula: "C = B log‚ÇÇ(1 + S/N)", description: "Shannon Channel Capacity" }, { formula: "f‚Çõ ‚â• 2f_{max}", description: "Nyquist Sampling Theorem" }, // Finance & Econometrics { formula: "‚àÇV/‚àÇt + ¬ΩœÉ¬≤S¬≤‚àÇ¬≤V/‚àÇS¬≤ + rS‚àÇV/‚àÇS - rV = 0", description: "Black-Scholes Equation" }, { formula: "C = S‚ÇÄŒ¶(d‚ÇÅ) - Ke^(-rT)Œ¶(d‚ÇÇ)", description: "Black-Scholes Call Price" }, { formula: "Œî = ‚àÇV/‚àÇS", description: "Option Delta" }, { formula: "E[R·µ¢] = r_f + Œ≤·µ¢(E[R_m] - r_f)", description: "Capital Asset Pricing Model" }, { formula: "R·µ¢ - r_f = Œ± + Œ≤_M R_M + Œ≤_{SMB}SMB + Œ≤_{HML}HML + Œµ", description: "Fama-French Three-Factor" }, { formula: "dr‚Çú = Œ∫(Œ∏-r‚Çú)dt + œÉdW‚Çú", description: "Vasicek Interest Rate Model" }, { formula: "dr‚Çú = Œ∫(Œ∏-r‚Çú)dt + œÉ‚àör‚ÇúdW‚Çú", description: "Cox-Ingersoll-Ross Model" }, { formula: "dS‚Çú = ŒºS‚Çúdt + ‚àöv‚ÇúS‚ÇúdW‚Çú^(1), dv‚Çú = Œ∫(Œ∏-v‚Çú)dt + œÉ‚àöv‚ÇúdW‚Çú^(2)", description: "Heston Stochastic Volatility" }, { formula: "œÉ‚Çú¬≤ = œâ + Œ±Œµ‚Çú‚Çã‚ÇÅ¬≤ + Œ≤œÉ‚Çú‚Çã‚ÇÅ¬≤", description: "GARCH(1,1) Model" }, { formula: "y‚Çú = Hx‚Çú + Œ∑‚Çú, x‚Çú‚Çä‚ÇÅ = Fx‚Çú + Œæ‚Çú", description: "State Space Model" }, { formula: "min_w w^TŒ£w s.t. w^TŒº = Œº*, w^T1 = 1", description: "Markowitz Portfolio" }, { formula: "ùíÆ = (E[R] - r_f)/œÉ_R", description: "Sharpe Ratio" }, { formula: "f* = (p(b+1) - 1)/b", description: "Kelly Criterion" }, { formula: "q(K) = e^(rT) ‚àÇ¬≤C/‚àÇK¬≤", description: "Risk-Neutral Density" }, { formula: "C - P = S‚ÇÄ - Ke^(-rT)", description: "Put-Call Parity" }, { formula: "dS‚Çú = S‚Çú((Œº-Œªk)dt + œÉdW‚Çú + dJ‚Çú)", description: "Jump Diffusion Model" }, { formula: "ES_Œ± = -1/Œ± ‚à´‚ÇÄ^Œ± F^(-1)(u)du", description: "Expected Shortfall" }, { formula: "œÜ(B)(1-B)^d X‚Çú = Œ∏(B)Œµ‚Çú", description: "ARFIMA Model" }, // Signal Processing & Dynamical Systems { formula: "(x*y)[n] = Œ£‚Çñ x[k]y[n-k]", description: "Discrete Convolution" }, { formula: "S_{xx}(f) = ‚Ñ±{R_{xx}(œÑ)}", description: "Power Spectral Density" }, { formula: "X(z) = Œ£‚Çô x[n]z^(-n)", description: "Z-Transform" }, { formula: "·∫ã = Ax + Bu, y = Cx + Du", description: "State Space Representation" }, { formula: "A^T P + PA = -Q, Q ‚âª 0 ‚áí V = x^T Px decays", description: "Lyapunov Stability" }, { formula: "x‚Çô‚Çä‚ÇÅ = rx‚Çô(1-x‚Çô)", description: "Logistic Map" }, { formula: "·∫ã = œÉ(y-x), ·∫è = x(œÅ-z)-y, ≈º = xy-Œ≤z", description: "Lorenz System" }, { formula: "Œª = lim_{t‚Üí‚àû} 1/t log(||Œ¥x(t)||/||Œ¥x(0)||)", description: "Lyapunov Exponent" }, // PDEs & Physics { formula: "œÅ(‚àÇ‚Çúu + u¬∑‚àáu) = -‚àáp + Œº‚àá¬≤u, ‚àá¬∑u = 0", description: "Navier-Stokes Equations" }, { formula: "‚àÇu/‚àÇt = Œ±‚àá¬≤u", description: "Heat Equation" }, { formula: "‚àÇ¬≤u/‚àÇt¬≤ = c¬≤‚àá¬≤u", description: "Wave Equation" }, { formula: "‚àá¬≤œÜ = -œÅ/Œµ‚ÇÄ", description: "Poisson's Equation" }, { formula: "‚àÇ‚Çúg·µ¢‚±º = -2R·µ¢‚±º", description: "Ricci Flow" }, { formula: "qÃá·µ¢ = ‚àÇH/‚àÇp·µ¢, ·πó·µ¢ = -‚àÇH/‚àÇq·µ¢", description: "Hamilton's Equations" }, { formula: "‚àá√óE = -‚àÇ‚ÇúB", description: "Faraday's Law" }, { formula: "i‚Ñè‚àÇ‚Çúœà = -‚Ñè¬≤/2m ‚àá¬≤œà + Vœà", description: "Schr√∂dinger Equation" }, { formula: "1/c ‚àÇI_ŒΩ/‚àÇt + n¬∑‚àáI_ŒΩ = Œ∑_ŒΩ - Œ∫_ŒΩ I_ŒΩ", description: "Radiative Transfer" }, { formula: "‚àÇ‚Çúc + u¬∑‚àác = D‚àá¬≤c", description: "Advection-Diffusion" }, { formula: "‚àÇ‚Çúu + u‚àÇ‚Çìu = ŒΩ‚àÇ‚Çì¬≤u", description: "Burgers' Equation" }, { formula: "‚àÇ‚ÇúœÜ = ‚àá¬≤(œÜ¬≥ - œÜ - Œ≥‚àá¬≤œÜ)", description: "Cahn-Hilliard Equation" }, // Geometry, Graphics & Vision { formula: "I = I_a k_a + I_d k_d(L¬∑N) + I_s k_s(R¬∑V)^n", description: "Phong Lighting Model" }, { formula: "[x',y',z',1]^T = P[x,y,z,1]^T", description: "3D Perspective Projection" }, { formula: "x‚ÇÇ^T F x‚ÇÅ = 0", description: "Fundamental Matrix" }, { formula: "E = ‚à¨[(I_x u + I_y v + I_t)¬≤ + Œ±¬≤(||‚àáu||¬≤ + ||‚àáv||¬≤)]dxdy", description: "Horn-Schunck Optical Flow" }, { formula: "(R*,t*) = argmin_{R,t} Œ£·µ¢||Rp·µ¢ + t - q·µ¢||¬≤", description: "Procrustes Analysis" }, { formula: "‚àÇ‚ÇúœÜ = ||‚àáœÜ||Œ∫", description: "Level Set Method" }, // Cryptography & Security { formula: "ed ‚â° 1 (mod œÜ(N))", description: "RSA Key Generation" }, { formula: "K = g^(ab) mod p", description: "Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange" }, { formula: "(x‚ÇÉ,y‚ÇÉ) = (Œª¬≤ - x‚ÇÅ - x‚ÇÇ, Œª(x‚ÇÅ - x‚ÇÉ) - y‚ÇÅ)", description: "Elliptic Curve Addition" }, { formula: "P(M|C) = P(M)", description: "Perfect Secrecy" }, // Graph Theory & Combinatorics { formula: "œÑ(G) = 1/n Œª‚ÇÇŒª‚ÇÉ¬∑¬∑¬∑Œª‚Çô", description: "Matrix-Tree Theorem" }, { formula: "L = D - A, L1 = 0", description: "Graph Laplacian" }, { formula: "p = log n/n for connectivity", description: "Erd≈ës-R√©nyi Threshold" }, { formula: "2h(G) ‚â• Œª‚ÇÇ ‚â• h(G)¬≤/2", description: "Cheeger's Inequality" }, // Miscellaneous Applied Gems { formula: "E[T] = n H_n ‚âà n ln n", description: "Coupon Collector Expected Time" }, { formula: "Œ£‚Çô P(A‚Çô) < ‚àû ‚áí P(A‚Çô i.o.) = 0", description: "Borel-Cantelli Lemma" }, { formula: "log Œ£·µ¢ e^(z·µ¢) = z_max + log Œ£·µ¢ e^(z·µ¢ - z_max)", description: "Log-Sum-Exp Trick" }, { formula: "œÉ(x) = log(1 + e^x)", description: "Softplus Activation" }, { formula: "ReLU(x) = max(0,x)", description: "ReLU Activation" }, { formula: "cos Œ∏ = (x¬∑y)/(||x|| ||y||)", description: "Cosine Similarity" }, { formula: "m ‚â• 4ln n/(Œµ¬≤/2 - Œµ¬≥/3)", description: "Hoeffding Sample Bound" }, { formula: "A‚Å∫ = VŒ£‚Å∫U^T", description: "Moore-Penrose Pseudoinverse" }, { formula: "d = 2R arcsin‚àö(sin¬≤(ŒîœÜ/2) + cos œÜ‚ÇÅ cos œÜ‚ÇÇ sin¬≤(ŒîŒª/2))", description: "Haversine Distance" }, { formula: "œÉ(x) = 1/(1 + e^(-x))", description: "Sigmoid Activation" } ]; useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentEquationIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % equations.length); }, 4000); return () => clearInterval(interval); // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps }, []); const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { const element = document.getElementById(sectionId); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; return (

setShowMathGame(true)} role="button" tabIndex={0} onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && setShowMathGame(true)} > {equations[currentEquationIndex].formula}

); }; export default Hero;
